HP:0011165	Focal sensory seizure with visual features	伴有视觉特征的局灶性感觉发作	A seizure characterized by elementary visual hallucinations such as flashing or flickering lights/colours, or other shapes, simple patterns, scotomata, or amaurosis as its first clinical manifestation.	校对中...
HP:0011166	Focal myoclonic seizure	局灶性肌阵挛发作	A type of focal motor seizure characterized by sudden, brief (<100 ms) involuntary single or multiple contraction(s) of muscles(s) or muscle groups of variable topography (axial, proximal limb, distal). Myoclonus is less regularly repetitive and less sustained than is clonus.	校对中...
HP:0011167	Focal tonic seizure	局灶性强直发作	A type of focal motor seizure characterized by sustained increase in muscle contraction, lasting a few seconds to minutes.	校对中...
HP:0011168	Focal seizure with eyelid myoclonia	局灶性癫痫伴眼睑肌阵挛	Focal seizure with eyelid myoclonia, not eyelid myoclonias in the context of absence seizures.	校对中...
HP:0011169	Generalized clonic seizure	全面性阵挛性发作	Generalized clonic seizure is a type of generalized motor seizure characterised by sustained bilateral jerking, either symmetric or asymmetric, that is regularly repetitive and involves the same muscle groups.	校对中...
HP:0011170	Generalized myoclonic-atonic seizure	全面性肌阵挛-失张力发作	A generalized myoclonic-atonic seizure is a type of generalized motor seizure characterized by a myoclonic jerk followed by an atonic motor component.	校对中...
HP:0011171	Simple febrile seizure	单纯型热性惊厥	A short generalized seizure, of a duration of <15 min, not recurring within 24 h, occurring during a febrile episode not caused by an acute disease of the nervous system intracranial infection or severe metabolic disturbance.	校对中...
HP:0011172	Complex febrile seizure	复杂性高热惊厥	A febrile seizure that has any of the following features: focal semiology (or associated with post-ictal neurologic abnormalities beyond drowsiness, such as a Todd's paresis), prolonged seizure beyond 15 minutes, or recurring (occurring more than once) in a 24 hour period.	校对中...
HP:0011173	Focal behavior arrest seizure	局灶性行为中止性癫痫发作	A type of focal non-motor seizure characterized by an arrest or pause of activities, freezing, or immobilization as the predominant semiological feature throughout the seizure.	校对中...
HP:0011174	Focal hyperkinetic seizure	局灶性过度运动发作	A focal seizure characterized at onset by predominantly proximal limb or axial muscles producing irregular sequential ballistic movements, such as pedaling, pelvic thrusting, thrashing, rocking movements.	校对中...
HP:0011175	Focal motor seizure with version	局灶性运动癫痫伴旋转	A type of focal motor seizure characterised by sustained, forced conjugate ocular, cephalic, and/or truncal rotation or lateral deviation from the midline as the initial semiological manifestation.	校对中...

HP:0011182	Interictal epileptiform activity	发作间期癫痫样放电	Epileptiform activity refers to distinctive EEG waves or complexes distinguished from background activity found in in a proportion of human subjects with epilepsy, but which can also be found in subjects without seizures. Interictal epileptiform activity refers to such activity that occurs in the absence of a clinical or subclinical seizure.	校对中...

HP:0011409	Abnormal placental membrane morphology	胎盘胎膜异常	Structural anomaly of the fetal membranes (also known as the amniochorionic or placental membranes), which comprise a vital intrauterine compartment, where they perform mechanical, immune, and endocrine functions to promote growth of the fetus and protection from environmental adversity. Amniochorionic membranes anatomically consist of a single layer of cuboidal amnion epithelial cells, chorionic trophoblasts, and scattered fibroblasts connected by a layer of type IV collagen-rich extracellular matrix.	校对中...

HP:0011425	Fetal ultrasound soft marker	胎儿超声软指标	An finding upon obstetric ultrasound examination performed at around 16 to 20 weeks of gestation that is abnormal but not clearly identifiable as a fetal anatomic malformation or growth restriction. Such findings are known as soft markers since they are associated with increased risk for fetal aneuploidy or other disorders.	校对中...
HP:0011426	Fetal choroid plexus cysts	胎儿脉络丛囊肿	Fetal choroid plexus cysts (CPCs) are sonographically discrete, small cysts found in the choroid plexus within the lateral cerebral ventricles of the developing fetus at 14 to 24 weeks gestation. Imaging of the choroid plexus is performed in the transverse plane of the fetal head at the same level that the lateral cerebral ventricle is evaluated. The choroid plexus should be inspected bilaterally for the presence of cysts. The size of CPCs is not of clinical relevance (PMID:16100637).	校对中...
HP:0011427	Enlarged fetal cisterna magna	胎儿小脑延髓池扩大	The cisterna magna is measured on a transaxial view of the fetal head angled 15 degrees caudal to the canthomeatal line. The anterior/posterior diameter is taken between the inferior/posterior surface of the vermis of the cerebellum to the inner surface of the cranium. An enlarged cisternal magna is defined by an anterior/posterior diameter of 10 mm or more (PMID:16100637).	校对中...
HP:0011428	Short fetal femur length	胎儿股骨短小	A short femur length is defined as either a measurement below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or a measurement that is less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The femur should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (PMID:16100637).	校对中...
HP:0011429	Short fetal humerus length	胎儿肱骨短小	A short humerus length is defined as a length below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or as a measurement less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The humerus should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (PMID:16100637).	校对中...
HP:0011430	Hypoplasia of fetal nasal bone	胎儿鼻骨发育不良	On prenatal ultrasound, the nasal bone is a thin echogenic line within the bridge of the fetal nose. The fetus is imaged facing the transducer with the fetal face strictly in the midline. The angle of insonation is 90 degrees, with the longitudinal axis of the nasal bone as the reference line. Calibres are placed at each end of the nasal bone. Absence of the nasal bone or measurements below 2.5th percentile are considered significant (PMID:16100637).	校对中...
HP:0011431	Fetal fifth finger clinodactyly	胎儿第五指屈指畸形	Fifth finger clinodactyly is defined by a hypoplastic or absent mid-phalanx of the fifth digit. Ultrasound identification of the fetal hand must first be undertaken and then appropriate magnification accomplished. The evaluation requires stretching of the 5 fingers. The diagnosis is established when the middle phalanx of the fifth finger is markedly smaller than normal or absent, which often causes the finger to be curved inward (PMID:16100637).	校对中...

HP:0011521	Deuteranopia	绿色盲	Complete lack of the M photopigment, which is replaced with the L photopigment. Affected individuals tend to confuse red and green.	校对中...

HP:0011540	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries	先天矫正型大动脉转位	The essence of the lesion is the combination of discordant atrioventricular and ventriculo-arterial connections. Thus, the morphologically right atrium is connected to a morphologically left ventricle across the mitral valve, with the left ventricle then connected to the pulmonary trunk. The morphologically left atrium is connected to the morphologically right ventricle across the tricuspid valve, with the morphologically right ventricle connected to the aorta.	校对中...

HP:0011546	Abnormal atrioventricular connection	房室连接异常	An abnormality of the circulatory connection between atria and ventricles.	校对中...
HP:0011547	Absent left sided atrioventricular connection	左侧房室接连缺失	A defect where there is no connection between the left atrium and left ventricle.	校对中...
HP:0011548	Absent right sided atrioventricular connection	右侧房室连接缺失	A defect where there is no connection between the right atrium and right ventricle.	校对中...
HP:0011549	Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection	左房室连接缺失致单心室心脏		
HP:0011550	Biventricular heart with straddling right sided atrioventricular valve and absent left sided atrioventricular connection	双心室心脏伴右房室瓣骑跨及左房室连接缺失		
HP:0011551	Right sided atrium to left ventricle and absent left sided atrioventricular connection	右房左室连接伴左房室连接缺失		
HP:0011552	Ambiguous atrioventricular connection	房室连接不明	With left or right cardiac isomerism in a biventricular, the atrioventricular connections are perforce ambiguous, in that one of the connections is concordant (e.g., right-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a morphologic right ventricle) and one of the connections is discordant (e.g., left-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a morphologic left ventricle).	校对中...
HP:0011553	Discordant atrioventricular connection	房室连接不协调	Connection of the right atrium to the left ventricle and of the left atrium to the right ventricle in a biventricular heart.	校对中...
HP:0011554	Double inlet atrioventricular connection	双入口型房室连接	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.	校对中...
HP:0011555	Double inlet left ventricle	左室双入口	The condition in which both atria are joined to the left ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually there is a hypoplastic right ventricle, which may be on the opposite side of the heart as usual.	校对中...
HP:0011556	Double inlet right ventricle	右室双入口	The condition in which both atria are joined to the right ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually, the left ventricle is hypoplastic.	校对中...
HP:0011557	Double inlet to single ventricle of indeterminate morphology	形态不明的单心室双入口	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. The morphology of this ventricle does not allow one to determine if it corresponds to the left or right ventricle.	校对中...
HP:0011558	Double inlet to single ventricle with common atrioventricular orifice	单室双入口伴共同房室口		
HP:0011559	Double inlet to single ventricle with two atrioventricular valves	单室双入口伴双房室瓣		
HP:0011560	Mitral atresia	二尖瓣闭锁	A congenital defect with failure to open of the mitral valve orifice.	校对中...
HP:0011561	Overriding atrioventricular valve	房室瓣骑跨	An atrioventricular valve that empties into both ventricles. The valve overrides the interventricular septum above a ventricular septum defect.	校对中...
HP:0011562	Straddling atrioventricular valve	跨界房室瓣	Anomalous insertion of the chordae tendinae or papillary muscles into the contralateral ventricle in the presence of a ventricular septum defect.	校对中...
HP:0011563	Abnormal ventriculoarterial connection	心室大动脉连接异常	An abnormality of the circulatory connection between the ventricles and the pulmonary artery and aorta.	校对中...
HP:0011564	Mitral valve arcade	二尖瓣弓形	Anomalous mitral valve arcade is diagnosed based on the following features (1) An adequately sized mitral valve orifice; (2) short, thick, and poorly differentiated chordae with direct union of the papillary muscles to the anterior leaflet; (3) narrow or nearly nonexistent spaces between the abnormal chordae; and (4) greater differentiation of the chordae attached to the posterior papillary muscle.	校对中...
HP:0011565	Common atrium	共同心房	Complete absence of the interatrial septum with common atrioventricular valve and two atrioventricular connections.	校对中...
HP:0011566	Cor triatriatum dexter	右侧三房心	A congenital anomaly with partitioning of the right atrium to form a triatrial heart caused by persistence of the right valve of the sinus venosus. Typically, the right atrial partition is due to exaggerated fetal eustachian and thebesian valves, which together form an incomplete septum across the lower part of the atrium. This septum may range from a reticulum to a substantial sheet of tissue.	校对中...
HP:0011567	Sinus venosus atrial septal defect	静脉窦型房间隔缺损	An interatrial communication caused by a deficiency of the common wall between the superior vena cava (SVC) and the right-sided pulmonary veins. SVASD is commonly associated with anomalous pulmonary venous connection (APVC) of some or all of the pulmonary veins, which produces additional left-to-right shunting.	校对中...
HP:0011568	Double orifice mitral valve	双孔二尖瓣	The left atrio-ventricular connection consists of two anatomically distinct orifices separated by accessory fibrous tissue.	校对中...
HP:0011569	Cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet	二尖瓣前叶裂	Cleft in the anterior mitral valve leaflet not associated with an atrioventricular canal defect.	校对中...
HP:0011570	Congenital mitral stenosis	先天性二尖瓣狭窄	Mitral stenosis with congenital onset.	校对中...
HP:0011571	Parachute mitral valve	降落伞型二尖瓣	Abnormality of the mitral valve apparatus, whereby chordae attach to a single papillary muscle or hypoplastic papillary muscles.	校对中...
HP:0011572	Supramitral ring	二尖瓣上环	A congenital stenotic mitral valvular anomaly with a ring of tissue above the mitral valve.	校对中...
HP:0011573	Hypoplastic tricuspid valve	三尖瓣发育不全	Congenital defect characterized by underdevelopment of the tricuspid valve.	校对中...
HP:0011574	Imperforate atrioventricular valve	房室瓣闭锁	An atrioventricular valve that has failed to open (atretic).	校对中...
HP:0011575	Imperforate tricuspid valve	三尖瓣闭锁	A tricuspid valve that has failed to open.	校对中...
HP:0011576	Intermediate atrioventricular canal defect	中间型房室管缺损	A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and inlet ventricular defect. There is one valve annulus and two valve orifices.	校对中...
HP:0011577	Partial atrioventricular canal defect	部分房室管缺损	A specific combination of heart defects including a primum atrial septal defect and cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet. There is not an inlet ventricular septal defect present. There are two valve annuluses and two valve orifices.	校对中...
HP:0011578	Transitional atrioventricular canal defect	过渡型房室管缺损	A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and an inlet ventricular septal defect. There are two valve annuli and two valve orifices.	校对中...
HP:0011579	Unbalanced atrioventricular canal defect	不平衡型房室管缺损	Anatomic features of unbalanced atrioventricular septal defect (AVSD) include varying amounts of ventricular hypoplasia, as well as malalignment of the atrioventricular junction. In complete AVSD, the common AV valve can be situated either equally over the right and left ventricles (balanced) or unequally over the ventricles (unbalanced).	校对中...
HP:0011580	Short chordae tendineae of the mitral valve	二尖瓣短腱索	Abnormally short chordae tendineae of the mitral valve.	校对中...
HP:0011581	Double outlet left ventricle	左室双出口	A congenital defect of heart development characterized by origin of both pulmonary artery and aorta from the morphological left ventricle.	校对中...
HP:0011582	Abdominal ectopia cordis	腹部心脏异位	Displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and into the abdomen.	校对中...
HP:0011583	Cervical ectopia cordis	颈部异位心	A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region and without a defect of the sternum.	校对中...
HP:0011584	Thoracocervical ectopia cordis	胸颈异位心	A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region with a defect of the superior portion of the sternum.	校对中...
HP:0011585	Thoracic ectopia cordis	胸廓异位心	Congenital malformation of the thoracic wall with partial or total displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity. This feature is associated with sternal cleft or absence of the sternum.	校对中...
HP:0011586	Thoracoabdominal ectopia cordis	胸腹异位心	Congenital malformation of the ventral wall with partial or total evisceration of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and displacement partially into the abdominal cavity.	校对中...
HP:0011587	Abnormal branching pattern of the aortic arch	主动脉弓分支异常	A deviance from the norm of the origin or course of the right brachiocephalic artery, the left common carotid artery, the left subclavian artery or the proximal vertebral arteries.	校对中...
HP:0011588	Cervical aortic arch	颈位主动脉弓	The aortic arch extends into the soft tissues of the neck before turning down into to become the descending aorta.	校对中...
HP:0011589	Common origin of the right brachiocephalic artery and left common carotid artery	右头臂干及左颈总动脉共同起源	The left common carotid artery has a common origin with the innominate artery.	校对中...
HP:0011590	Double aortic arch	双主动脉弓	A conenital abnormality of the aortic arch in which the two embryonic aortc arches form a vascular ring that surrounds the trachea or esophagus and then join to form the descending aorta. Double aortic arch can cause symptoms because of compression of the esophagus (dysphagia, cyanosis while eating) or trachea (stridor).	校对中...
HP:0011591	Left aortic arch with cervical origin of the right subclavian artery	左位主动脉弓伴颈总动脉源型右锁骨下动脉		
HP:0011592	Left aortic arch with isolated subclavian artery	左位主动脉弓伴孤立型锁骨下动脉	The subclavian artery arises from ductus arteriosus. While the ductus arteriosus is patent its blood supply comes from the ductus, hence from the pulmonary artery. After it closes, the blood supply is retrogradely from the vertebral artery via the circle of Willis.	校对中...
HP:0011593	Left aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell	左位主动脉弓伴食管后Kommerell憩室	A patent ductus arteriosus or ductal ligament completes the ring.	校对中...
HP:0011594	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell	右主动脉弓伴食管后科默雷尔憩室	Aortic arch crosses the right mainstem bronchus. The left carotid artery is the first branch, right carotid artery the second branch and right subclavian artery as the third branch.	校对中...
HP:0011595	Left aortic arch with retroesophageal right subclavian artery	左位主动脉弓伴食管后右锁骨下动脉	Aortic arch crosses the left mainstem bronchus. The first branch is the right carotid artery, the second branch is the left carotid artery, the third branch is the subclavian artery, the fourth branch is the right subclavian artery arising from the posteromedial aspect of the distal aortic arch and continuing posterior to the esophagus to the right hand side of the body.	校对中...
HP:0011596	Left aortic arch with right descending aorta and right ductus arteriosus	左位主动脉弓伴右位降主动脉及右位动脉导管未闭	The ring may be completed by the ductal ligament.	校对中...
HP:0011597	Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus	右位主动脉弓伴左位降主动脉及左动脉导管未闭		
HP:0011598	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery	右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉		
HP:0011599	Mesocardia	中位心	Mesocardia is an abnormal location of the heart in which the heart is in a midline position and the longitudinal axis of the heart lies in the mid-sagittal plane.	校对中...
HP:0011600	Abnormal direction of ventricular apex	心室尖部指向异常	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex. Left sided is normal.	校对中...
HP:0011601	Rightward direction of ventricular apex	心室尖向右	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex towards the right. Left sided is normal.	校对中...
HP:0011602	Midline direction of ventricular apex	心室尖向中	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex in the midline. Left sided is normal.	校对中...
HP:0011603	Congenital malformation of the great arteries	先天性大动脉畸形	Defect or defects of the morphogenesis of the aorta and pulmonary arteries.	校对中...
HP:0011604	Aortopulmonary window	主肺动脉窗	A congenital anomaly with an abnormal connection between the aorta and the main pulmonary artery resulting in an aortopulmonary shunt.	校对中...
HP:0011605	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	先天矫正型大动脉转位伴室间隔缺损	A congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries with a ventricular septal defect: a hole between the two bottom chambers (ventricles) of the heart. The ventricular septal defect is centered around the most superior aspect of the ventricular septum.	校对中...
HP:0011608	Type II truncus arteriosus	II型动脉干	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) with each pulmonary artery arising separate from each other on the posterior or lateral aspect of the truncus.	校对中...
HP:0011609	Type III truncus arteriosus	III型动脉干	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby one of the two pulmonary artery branched does not arise from the common pulmonary trunk, but instead from the ductus arteriosus or directly from the aorta.	校对中...
HP:0011610	Type IV truncus arteriosus	IV型动脉干	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby the aortic arch is hypoplastic or interrupted, and a large patent ductus arteriosus is present.	校对中...
HP:0011611	Interrupted aortic arch	主动脉弓断离	Non-continuity of the arch of aorta with an atretic point or absent segment.	校对中...
HP:0011612	Interrupted aortic arch type A	A型主动脉弓断离	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment at the level of the isthmus.	校对中...
HP:0011613	Interrupted aortic arch type B	B型主动脉弓断离	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the left carotid and subclavian arteries.	校对中...
HP:0011614	Interrupted aortic arch type C	C型主动脉弓断离	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the innominate and left carotid arteries.	校对中...
HP:0011615	Abnormal pulmonary situs morphology	肺位置形态学异常	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, which is defined by characteristics such as the number of lobes per lung and the relationship of the pulmonary arteries to their bronchi.	校对中...
HP:0011616	Pulmonary situs inversus	肺脏位置逆转	Mirror image arrangement of the mainstem bronchi with the right pulmonary artery posterior to the right upper lobe bronchus and the left pulmonary artery anterior to the left upper lobe bronchus.	校对中...
HP:0011617	Pulmonary situs ambiguus	肺原位异位	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which the morphology of both left and right lungs is the same.	校对中...
HP:0011618	Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic right lungs	肺脏双侧形态似右肺	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a right lung.	校对中...
HP:0011619	Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic left lungs	肺脏双侧形态似左肺	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a left lung.	校对中...
HP:0011620	Abnormality of abdominal situs	腹部位置异常	An abnormality of the abdominal situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the abdomen and its organs.	校对中...
HP:0011621	Gerbode ventricular septal defect	Gerbode室间隔缺损	A type of ventricular septal defect communicating directly between the left ventricle and right atrium. This is anatomically possible because the normal tricuspid valve is more apically displaced than the mitral valve.	校对中...
HP:0011622	Inlet ventricular septal defect	入口型室间隔缺损	A ventricular septal defect that involves the inlet of the right ventricular septum immediately inferior to the AV valve apparatus.	校对中...
HP:0011623	Muscular ventricular septal defect	肌部室间隔缺损	The trabecular septum is the largest part of the interventricular septum. It extends from the membranous septum to the apex and superiorly to the infundibular septum. A defect in the trabecular septum is called muscular VSD if the defect is completely rimmed by muscle.	校对中...
HP:0011624	Apical muscular ventricular septal defect	心尖肌部型室间隔缺损	A muscular ventricular septal defect located at the apex of the heart.	校对中...
HP:0011625	Multiple muscular ventricular septal defects	多发肌部型室间隔缺损	A type of muscular ventricular septal defect characterized by the presence of multiple small defects in the ventricular septum.	校对中...
HP:0011626	Scimitar anomaly	弯刀异常	Right pulmonary venous return to the inferior vena cava.	校对中...
HP:0011627	Aorto-ventricular tunnel	主动脉-心室隧道	Aorto-ventricular tunnel is a congenital, extracardiac channel which connects the ascending aorta above the sinutubular junction to the cavity of the left, or (less commonly) right ventricle.	校对中...
HP:0011628	Congenital defect of the pericardium	先天性心包缺陷	A developmental defect of the pericardium with congenital onset.	校对中...
HP:0011629	Total absence of the pericardium	完全型心包膜缺失	No pericardium around the heart, occurring as a congenital defect, not the result of a surgical pericardectomy.	校对中...
HP:0011630	Complete diaphragmatic absence of pericardium	完全型膈面心包缺失	No pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.	校对中...
HP:0011631	Complete right sided absence of pericardium	完全型右侧心包缺失	No pericardium is present on the righthand side of the heart. It is a congenital absence of pericardium rather than the result of a pericardectomy.	校对中...
HP:0011632	Partial right sided absence of pericardium	部分右侧心包缺如	A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the righthand side of the heart.	校对中...
HP:0011633	Complete left sided absence of pericardium	完全型左侧心包缺失	A congenital anomaly with complete lack of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.	校对中...
HP:0011634	Partial left sided absence of pericardium	部分左侧心包缺如	A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.	校对中...
HP:0011635	Partial diaphragmatic absence of pericardium	部分型膈面心包缺失	Lack of a part of the pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.	校对中...
HP:0011636	Abnormal coronary artery origin	冠状动脉起源异常	Isolated abnormalities of the coronary artery origins. This may be in associated with other structural heart malformations but not the patterns of complex structural heart malformations which result in abnormal course of the coronary arteries.	校对中...
HP:0011637	Anomalous origin of coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	肺动脉源性冠状动脉起源异常	A coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta.	校对中...
HP:0011638	Anomalous origin of left coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	肺动脉源性左冠状动脉起源异常	Left main coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the left cusp of the aortic valve.	校对中...
HP:0011639	Anomalous origin of right coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	肺动脉源性右冠状动脉起源异常	Right coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the right cusp of the aortic valve.	校对中...
HP:0011640	Single coronary artery origin	单一冠状动脉起源	The presence of a single coronary artery ostium from which both coronary arteries arise.	校对中...
HP:0011641	Coronary artery fistula	冠状动脉瘘	A congenital malformation with abnormal connection between one of the coronary arteries and a heart chamber or another blood vessel.	校对中...
HP:0011642	Abnormal coronary sinus morphology	冠状窦形态异常	An abnormality of the coronary sinus, which is formed by the union of the great cardiac vein and the left marginal vein and terminates in the right atrium. The coronary sinus functions to o collect deoxygenated blood from the myocardium of the heart and drain it into the right atrium.	校对中...
HP:0011643	Coronary sinus atrial septal defect	冠状静脉窦型房间隔缺损	An atrial septal defect characterized by a deficiency in the tissue separating the coronary sinus from the left atrium (LA). This results in partial or complete unroofing of the coronary sinus leading to a predominantly left-to-right shunt through the coronary sinus (LA to coronary sinus to right atrium [RA]). The orifice of the ostium is frequently large because of the increased flow. From the RA side, the defect is located at the level of the coronary sinus ostium and may also include some deficiency in atrial tissue around the ostium. From the LA side, the size can be variable depending on the degree of unroofing of the coronary sinus.	校对中...
HP:0011644	Coronary sinus diverticulum	冠状窦憩室	A venous pouch within the left ventricular wall, with a neck opening into the coronary sinus.	校对中...
HP:0011645	Dilatation of the sinus of Valsalva	主动脉窦部扩张	Abnormal outpouching or sac-like dilatation of one of the anatomic dilations of the ascending aorta, which occurs just above the aortic valve.	校对中...
HP:0011646	Juxtaductal coarctation of the aorta	导管旁主动脉缩窄	Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized at the insertion of the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the juxtaductal region of aortic arch.	校对中...
HP:0011647	Postductal coarctation of the aorta	导管后主动脉缩窄	Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized distal to the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the postductal region of aortic arch.	校对中...
HP:0011648	Patent ductus arteriosus after birth at term	足月儿动脉导管未闭	Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus in postnatal life when birth was at 37 completed weeks of gestation or greater.	校对中...
HP:0011649	Patent ductus arteriosus after premature birth	早产儿动脉导管未闭	Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus when birth was at less than 37 weeks completed gestation.	校对中...
HP:0011650	Bilateral ductus arteriosus	双侧动脉导管	The presence of both a left and a right ductus arteriosus.	校对中...
HP:0011651	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	A double outlet right ventricle with a subaortic ventritricular septal defect (a hole between the two bottom chambers (ventricles) of the heart), that extends anterosuperiorly and are closely related to the pulmonary artery as well, are considered to be doubly committed. There is associated pulmonary stenosis, the abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.	校对中...
HP:0011652	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	A double outlet right ventricle with a subaortic ventritricular septal defect (a hole between the two bottom chambers (ventricles) of the heart), that extends anterosuperiorly and are closely related to the pulmonary artery as well, are considered to be doubly committed. There is not associated pulmonary stenosis, the abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.	校对中...
HP:0011653	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	A double outlet right ventricle with a non-committed ventricular septal defect (VSD), which is a VSD that is anatomically related to, or close to, neither great vessel, being separated from both by considerable muscle, and also has a pulmonary stenosis; abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.	校对中...
HP:0011654	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	A double outlet right ventricle with a non-committed ventricular septal defect (VSD), which is a VSD that is anatomically related to, or close to, neither great vessel, being separated from both by considerable muscle, but there is not accompanying pulmonary stenosis; the abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.	校对中...
HP:0011655	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	A double outlet right ventricle with a ventricular spetal defect (a hole between the two bottom chambers (ventricles) of the heart), that is considered to be closely related to the aortic origin. There is associated pulmonary stenosis, the abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.	校对中...
HP:0011656	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	A double outlet right ventricle with a ventricular spetal defect (a hole between the two bottom chambers (ventricles) of the heart), that is considered to be closely related to the aortic origin. There is not associated pulmonary stenosis, the abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.	校对中...
HP:0011657	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	A double outlet right ventricle with a ventricular spetal defect (a hole between the two bottom chambers (ventricles) of the heart), that is considered to be closely related to the pulmonary origin. There is associated pulmonary stenosis, the abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.	校对中...
HP:0011658	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	A double outlet right ventricle with a ventricular spetal defect (a hole between the two bottom chambers (ventricles) of the heart), that is considered to be closely related to the pulmonary origin. There is not associated pulmonary stenosis, the abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.	校对中...
HP:0011659	Tetralogy of Fallot with absent pulmonary valve	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣缺失	Features of tetralogy of Fallot with either rudimentary ridges or the complete absence of pulmonic valve tissue.	校对中...
HP:0011660	Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from ascending aorta	一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉	Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from the ascending aorta with the contralateral pulmonary artery arising from the right ventricle.	校对中...
HP:0011661	Anomalous origin of left pulmonary artery from ascending aorta	左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉	The left pulmonary artery originates from the ascending aorta in the presence of a pulmonary valve and main pulmonary artery.	校对中...
HP:0011662	Tricuspid atresia	三尖瓣闭锁	Failure to develop of the tricuspid valve and thus lack of the normal connection between the right atrium and the right ventricle.	校对中...
HP:0011663	Right ventricular cardiomyopathy	右室心肌病	Right ventricular dysfunction (global or regional) with functional and morphological right ventricular abnormalities, with or without left ventricular disease.	校对中...
HP:0011664	Left ventricular noncompaction cardiomyopathy	左室致密化不全心肌病	Left ventricular non-compaction (LVNC) is characterized by prominent left ventricular trabeculae and deep inter-trabecular recesses. The myocardial wall is often thickened with a thin, compacted epicardial layer and a thickened endocardial layer. In some patients, LVNC is associated with left ventricular dilatation and systolic dysfunction, which can be transient in neonates.	校对中...
HP:0011665	Takotsubo cardiomyopathy	应激性心肌病	Transient left ventricular apical ballooning syndrome or takotsubo cardiomyopathy is characterized by transient regional systolic dysfunction involving the left ventricular apex and/or mid-ventricle in the absence of obstructive coronary disease on coronary angiography. Patients present with an abrupt onset of angina-like chest pain, and have diffuse T-wave inversion, sometimes preceded by ST-segment elevation, and mild cardiac enzyme elevation.	校对中...
HP:0011666	Absent right superior vena cava	右上腔静脉缺如	Absence of the right superior vena cava (RSVC). An absent RSVC is always associated with a persistent left superior vena cava (PLSVC). During normal fetal development, the left-sided anterior venous cardinal system regresses, leaving the coronary sinus (CS) and the ligament of Marshall. Failure of the closure of the left anterior cardinal vein results in PLSVC. In general, PLSVC is associated with the right superior vena cava (RSVC) and drains into the RA via a dilated CS. When developmental arrest occurs at an earlier stage, the CS is absent and the PLSVC drains into the left atrium.	校对中...
HP:0011667	Bilateral superior vena cava with bridging vein	双侧上腔静脉伴桥静脉		
HP:0011668	Bilateral superior vena cava with no bridging vein	双侧上腔静脉不伴桥静脉		
HP:0011669	Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium	左上腔静脉接左心房	A persistent left superior vena cava (PLSVC) that drains into the left atrium instead of the right atrium via the coronary sinus, resulting in a right to left sided shunt.	校对中...
HP:0011670	Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus	左上腔静脉接冠状窦	A persistent left superior vena cava (PLSVC) that drains into the right atrium via the coronary sinus. This is the case in 80-92% of cases of PLSVC and results in no hemodynamic consequence.	校对中...
HP:0011671	Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation	下腔静脉中断伴奇静脉延续	Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation is the result of connection failure between the right subcardinal vein and the right vitelline vein. Consequently, venous blood from the caudal part of the body reaches the heart via the azygous vein and superior vena cava.	校对中...
HP:0011672	Cardiac myxoma	心脏粘液瘤	A myxoma (tumor of primitive connective tissue) of the heart. Cardiac myxomas consist of stellate to plump, cytologically bland mesenchymal cells set in a myxoid stroma. Cardiac myxomas are of endocardial origina and general project from the endocardium into a cardiac chamber.	校对中...
HP:0011673	Cardiac hemangioma	心脏血管瘤	Abnormal proliferation of blood vessels within the cardiac cavities attached to the endocardium.	校对中...
HP:0011674	Cardiac teratoma	心脏畸胎瘤	A teratoma within the heart. Most commonly, these tumors are detected in the pericardial cavity attached to the pulmonary artery and aorta. The tumour size within the heart varies from 2 to 9 cm in diameter, and intrapericardial tumors as large as 15 cm have been reported. Intracardiac tumors arise from the atrial or ventricular wall as nodular masses protruding into the cardiac chambers. Cardiac and pericardial teratomas are easily detected in the fetus and neonate by two-dimensional echocardiography as heterogeneous and encapsulated cystic masses. Histologically, cardiac teratomas contain multiple immature elements including epithelium, neuroglial tissue, thyroid, pancreas, smooth and skeletal muscle, cartilage and bone.	校对中...
HP:0011675	Arrhythmia	心律失常	Any cardiac rhythm other than the normal sinus rhythm. Such a rhythm may be either of sinus or ectopic origin and either regular or irregular. An arrhythmia may be due to a disturbance in impulse formation or conduction or both.	校对中...
HP:0011676	Tetralogy of Fallot with absent subarterial conus	法洛四联症伴瓣下圆锥缺失		
HP:0011677	Tetralogy of Fallot with atrioventricular canal defect	法洛四联症伴房室管缺陷		
HP:0011678	Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia and major aortopulmonary collateral arteries	法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁及主肺动脉侧支动脉	A type of tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia in which all pulmonary blood flow is derived from major aortopulmonary collateral arteries (MAPCA).	校对中...
HP:0011679	Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary stenosis	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄	The commonest form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by pulmonary stenosis, overriding aorta, ventricular septum defect, and right ventricular hypertrophy, without pulmonary atresia, absent pulmonary valve, atrioventricular canal defect or absent subarterial conus.	校对中...
HP:0011680	Single ventricle of indeterminate morphology	未定型单心室		
HP:0011681	Subarterial ventricular septal defect	动脉下室间隔缺损	A ventricular septal defect that lies beneath the semilunar valve(s) in the conal or outlet septum.	校对中...
HP:0011682	Perimembranous ventricular septal defect	膜周型室间隔缺损	A ventricular septal defect that is confluent with and involves the membranous septum and is bordered by an atrioventricular valve, not including the type 3 VSDs.	校对中...
HP:0011683	Restrictive ventricular septal defect	限制型室间隔缺损	Any ventricular septal defect (VSD) that is small enough to restrict flow across it such that a pressure gradient exists between the two sides of the VSD.	校对中...
HP:0011684	Non-restrictive ventricular septal defect	非限制型室间隔缺损	Any ventricular septal defect (VSD) that does not restrict flow across it sufficiently to generate a pressure gradient between the two sides of the VSD.	校对中...
HP:0011685	Infra-aortic superior vena cava	主动脉下上腔静脉	The superior vena cava passes below the aortic arch.	校对中...
HP:0011686	Abnormal coronary artery course	冠状动脉走行异常	An abnormal path of a coronary artery.	校对中...
HP:0011687	AV nodal tachycardia	房室结型心动过速	A type of supraventricular tachycardia that originates in the atrioventricular node.	校对中...
HP:0011688	Supraventricular tachycardia with an accessory connection mediated pathway	室上性心动过速伴旁路连接	Supraventricular tachycardia in which an accessory pathway connecting the atria and ventricles, apart from the AV node, participates as a necessary part of a reentrant mechanism.	校对中...
HP:0011689	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory connection	室上性心动过速伴隐匿性旁路	Supraventricular tachycardia with an accessory connection mediated pathway that is called concealed becasue it is not seen on the ECG during sinus rhythm.	校对中...
HP:0011690	Permanent junctional reciprocating tachycardia	持续性交界性反复性心动过速	An incessant orthodromic tachycardia with anterograde conduction over the atrioventricular node and by retrograde conduction via an accessory pathway usually located in the posteroseptal region with slow and decremental conduction.	校对中...
HP:0011691	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the left free wall	室上性心动过速伴左侧游离壁隐匿性旁路		
HP:0011692	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the right free wall	室上性心动过速伴右侧游离壁隐匿性旁路		
HP:0011693	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the septum	室上性心动过速伴间隔隐匿性旁路		
HP:0011694	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway	室上性心动过速伴显性旁路		
HP:0011695	Cerebellar hemorrhage	小脑出血	Hemorrhage into the parenchyma of the cerebellum.	校对中...
HP:0011696	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the left free wall	室上性心动过速伴左侧游离壁显性旁路		
HP:0011697	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the right free wall	室上性心动过速伴右侧游离壁显性旁路		
HP:0011698	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the septum	室上性心动过速伴间隔显性旁路		
HP:0011699	Atrial reentry tachycardia	心房折返性心动过速		
HP:0011700	Automatic atrial tachycardia	自律性房性心动过速	Chronic supraventricular tachycardia predominantly seen in childhood.	校对中...
HP:0011701	Multifocal atrial tachycardia	多灶性房性心动过速	Multifocal atrial tachycardia is a rare supraventricular arrhythmia in neonates and young infants that is characterized by multiple P waves with varying P wave morphology and is usually asymptomatic.	校对中...
HP:0011702	Abnormal electrophysiology of sinoatrial node origin	窦房结源性电生理异常	An abnormality of the sinoatrial (SA) node in the right atrium. THe SA node acts as the pacemaker of the heart.	校对中...
HP:0011703	Sinus tachycardia	窦性心动过速	Heart rate of greater than 100 beats per minute.	校对中...
HP:0011704	Sick sinus syndrome	病窦综合征	An abnormality involving the generation of the action potential by the sinus node and is characterized by an atrial rate inappropriate for physiological requirements. Manifestations include severe sinus bradycardia, sinus pauses or arrest, sinus node exit block, chronic atrial tachyarrhythmias, alternating periods of atrial bradyarrhythmias and tachyarrhythmias, and inappropriate responses of heart rate during exercise or stress.	校对中...
HP:0011705	First degree atrioventricular block	一度房室传导阻滞	Delay of conduction through the atrioventricular node, which is manifested as prolongation of the PR interval in the electrocardiogram (EKG). All atrial impulses reach the ventricles.	校对中...
HP:0011706	Second degree atrioventricular block	二度房室传导阻滞	An intermittent atrioventricular block with failure of some atrial impulses to conduct to the ventricles, i.e., some but not all atrial impulses are conducted through the atrioventricular node and trigger ventricular contraction.	校对中...
HP:0011707	Mobitz I atrioventricular block	默比茨I型房室传导阻滞	Progressive PR interval prolongation with the subsequent occurrence of a single nonconducted P wave that results in a pause. The pause that follows the nonconducted impulse is less than fully compensatory (less than the sum of two normal sinus intervals).	校对中...
HP:0011708	Mobitz II atrioventricular block	默比茨II型房室传导阻滞	A type of second degree atrioventricular (AV) block characterized by sudden failure to conduct an impulse through the AV node without a preceding change in the PR interval.	校对中...
HP:0011709	Atrioventricular dissociation	房室分离	Atrioventricular (AV) dissociation is present if the atria and the ventricles are under the control of two separate pacemakers. AV dissociation can occur in the absence of a primary AV conduction disturbance.	校对中...
HP:0011710	Bundle branch block	束支传导阻滞	Block of conduction of electrical impulses along the Bundle of His or along one of its bundle branches.	校对中...
HP:0011711	Left anterior fascicular block	左前分支传导阻滞	Conduction block in the anterior division of the left bundle branch of the bundle of His.	校对中...
HP:0011712	Right bundle branch block	右束支传导阻滞	A conduction block of the right branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a prolongation of the QRS complex (greater than 0.12 s) with delayed activation of the right ventricle and terminal delay on the EKG.	校对中...
HP:0011713	Left bundle branch block	左束支传导阻滞	A conduction block of the left branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a generalized disturbance of QRS morphology on EKG.	校对中...
HP:0011714	Libman-Sacks lesions	利布曼－萨克斯病变	Libman-Sacks valvular lesions are sterile fibrofibrinous vegetations that favor the left-sided heart valves and usually form on the ventricular surface of the mitral valve.	校对中...
HP:0011715	Trifascicular block	三支传导阻滞	Abnormal conduction in all three divisions of the intraventricular conducting tissue.	校对中...
HP:0011716	Junctional ectopic tachycardia	交界性异位心动过速	Junctional ectopic tachycardia (JET) is a unique type of supraventricular arrhythmia defined by narrow QRS complex and atrioventricular (AV) dissociation or retrograde atrial conduction in a 1:1 pattern.	校对中...
HP:0011717	Atrioventricular reentrant tachycardia	房室折返性心动过速	Accessory pathway-related atrioventricular reentrant tachycardia (AVRT) involves an abnormal electrical conduction of the accessory pathway. The accessory pathway connecting impulses between the atrium and the ventricle can be seen at any site in the AV groove.	校对中...
HP:0011718	Abnormality of the pulmonary veins	肺静脉异常	An abnormality of the pulmonary veins.	校对中...

HP:0011722	Mixed total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	混合型完全性肺静脉连接异常	Type 4 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	校对中...
HP:0011723	Congenital malformation of the right heart	先天性右心畸形	Defect or defects of the morphogenesis of the right heart identifiable at birth.	校对中...
HP:0011724	Uhl's anomaly	Uhl畸形	Uhl anomaly of the right ventricle refers to the almost complete absence of right ventricular myocardium, normal tricuspid valve, and preserved septal and left ventricular myocardium.	校对中...
HP:0011725	Chaotic multifocal atrial tachycardia	紊乱性多源性房性心动过速		
HP:0011726	Persistent fetal circulation	持续性胎儿循环	Systemic desaturation of a liveborn baby resulting from persistent pulmonary hypertension with a patent ductus arteriosus and patent foramen ovale, such that the circulation in postnatal life follows the fetal course.	校对中...
HP:0011727	Peroneal muscle weakness	腓骨肌无力	Weakness of the peroneal muscles.	校对中...
HP:0011728	Elbow clonus	肘部阵挛	Clonus at the elbow joint, i.e., an exaggerated phasic stretch reflex characterized by repetitive, rhythmic contractions at the elbow, generated by rapid passive stretch at the elbow joint.	校对中...
HP:0011729	Abnormality of joint mobility	关节活动异常	An abnormality in the range and ease of motion of joints across their normal range.	校对中...
HP:0011730	Abnormal central sensory function	中枢感觉功能异常	An abnormality of sensation related to CNS function. Assuming the primary sensory modalities are intact and the patient is alert and cooperative, the presence of an abnormality of sensory function may indicate a lesion of a parietal cortex, the thalamocortical projections to the parietal cortex, or the spinal cord.	校对中...
HP:0011731	Abnormality of circulating cortisol level	血皮质醇水平异常	An abnormality of the concentration of cortisol in the blood.	校对中...

HP:0011734	Central adrenal insufficiency	中枢性肾上腺功能不全	A form of adrenal insufficiency related to a lack of ACTH, which leads to a decrease in the production of cortisol by the adrenal glands. Aldosterone production is not usually affected.	校对中...
HP:0011735	Adrenocorticotropin deficient adrenal insufficiency	促肾上腺皮质激素缺陷性肾上腺功能不全	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in ACTH production.	校对中...

HP:0011737	Corticotropin-releasing hormone deficient adrenal insufficiency	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素缺陷性肾上腺功能不全	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in corticotropin-releasing hormone production.	校对中...
HP:0011738	Corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor defect	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体缺陷	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in the corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor.	校对中...
HP:0011739	Dexamethasone-suppressible primary hyperaldosteronism	地塞米松可抑制的原发性醛固酮增多症	A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone can be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone.	校对中...
HP:0011740	Glucocortocoid-insensitive primary hyperaldosteronism	糖皮质激素不敏感的原发性醛固酮增多症	A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone cannot be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone or similar glucocorticoids.	校对中...

HP:0011745	Non-secretory adrenocortical adenoma	非分泌性肾上腺皮质腺瘤	An hormonally inactive adrenocortical adenoma, that is, an adenoma that does not secrete excessive amounts of adrenal hormones.	校对中...

HP:0011749	Adrenocorticotropic hormone excess	促肾上腺皮质激素过多	Overproduction of adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), which generally leads secondarily to overproduction of cortisol by the adrenal cortex.	校对中...
HP:0011750	Neoplasm of the anterior pituitary	垂体前叶肿瘤	A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the adenohypophysis, which is also known as the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland.	校对中...

HP:0011753	Posterior pituitary dysgenesis	垂体后叶发育异常	Abnormal development of the neurohypophysis during embryonic growth and development.	校对中...
HP:0011754	Pituicytoma	垂体细胞瘤	A solid, low grade, spindle cell, glial neoplasm of adults that originates in the neurohypophysis or infundibulum. Clinical signs and symptoms include visual disturbance, headache and features of hypopituitarism. Pituicytomas are well-circumscribed, solid masses that can measure up to several centimeters. Histologically, they show a compact architecture consisting of elongate, bipolar spindle cells arranged in interlacing fascicles or assuming a storiform pattern.	校对中...
HP:0011755	Ectopic posterior pituitary	垂体后叶异位	An abnormal anatomical location of the posterior lobe of the hypophysis, also known as the neurohypophysis. The posterior pituitary is normally present in the dorsal portion of the sella turcica, but when ectopic is usually near the median eminence. This defect is likely to be due to abnormal migration during embryogenesis.	校对中...
HP:0011756	Posterior pituitary agenesis	垂体后叶缺失	Absence of the neurohypophysis owing to a developmental defect.	校对中...

HP:0011763	Pituitary carcinoma	垂体腺癌	A pituitary tumor with subarachnoid, brain, or systemic metastasis. The diagnosis of a pituitary carcinoma requires evidence of metastatic disease, either outside the central nervous system (CNS) or as separate noncontiguous foci within the CNS.	校对中...
HP:0011764	Pituitary spindle cell oncocytoma	垂体梭形细胞嗜酸细胞瘤	A spindled-to-epithelioid, oncocytic, nonendocrine neoplasm of the anterior hypophysis that manifests in adults and follows a benign clinical course. Pituitary spindle cell oncocytomas are firm, fibrous, and adherent to surrounding structures and are highly vascular.	校对中...

Although kidney transplantation leads to a normalization of serum calcium and parathyroid hormone in most patients. The state of persistent hypercalcemia and hyperparathyroidism is referred to as tertiary hyperparathyroidism.	校对中...

HP:0011817	Basal encephalocele	基底脑膨出	Basal encephalocele is an encephalocele that occurs along the cribriform plate or through the sphenoid bone. The mass may appear in the nasal cavity, nasopharynx, epipharynx, sphenoid sinus, posterior orbit, or pterygopalatine fossa. The important distinction from other types is that no external tumor is visible except in those rare instances of herniations so large that they protrude through the mouth or nares.	校对中...

HP:0011903	HbH hemoglobin	血红蛋白H	Hemoglobin H (HbH) contains four beta-globin chains. It is normally not present at all in blood, but may make up about 1-40 percent of all hemoglobin in HbH disease, a subform of alpha thalassemia.	校对中...
HP:0011904	Persistence of hemoglobin F	胎儿血红蛋白F持续存在	Hemoglobin F (HbF) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin gamma chains. It is the main form of hemoglobin in the fetus during the last seven months of intrauterine development and in the half year of postnatal life. In adults it normally makes up less than one percent of all hemoglobin. This term refers to an increase in HbF above this limit. In beta thalassemia major, it may represent over 90 percent of all hemoglobin, and in beta thalassemia minor it may make up between 0.5 to 4 percent.	校对中...
HP:0011905	Reduced hemoglobin A	血红蛋白A减低	Hemoglobin A (HbA) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin beta chains. HbA is normally the main adult hemoglobin, representing about 96-98 percent of all hemoglobin. This term represents a decreased in the proportion of HbA below this limit, and can be seen in various forms of thalassemia.	校对中...
HP:0011906	Reduced beta/alpha synthesis ratio	β/α合成比减低	A reduction in the ratio of production of beta globin to that of alpha globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of beta thalassemia.	校对中...

HP:0011919	Pleural empyema	脓胸	Accumulation of pus in the pleural cavity.	校对中...
HP:0011920	Transudative pleural effusion	漏出性胸腔积液	A type of pleural effusion with a transudate (extravascular fluid with low protein content and a low specific gravity). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light's criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.	校对中...
HP:0011921	Exudative pleural effusion	渗出性胸腔积液	A type of pleural effusion with a exudate (extravascular fluid that has exuded out of a tissue or its capillaries due to injury or inflammation). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light's criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.	校对中...
HP:0011922	Abnormal activity of mitochondrial respiratory chain	线粒体呼吸链活性异常	An increased or decreased activity of the mitochondrial respiratory chain.	校对中...

HP:0012054	Choroidal melanoma	脉络膜黑色素瘤	Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the choroid. Choroidal melanoma is usually pigmented, but can be variably pigmented and even amelanotic (non-pigmented).	校对中...

HP:0012058	Nodular melanoma	结节性黑素瘤	A type of melanoma that starts as a raised area that is usually dark blackish-blue or bluish-red but may not have any color.	校对中...
HP:0012059	Lentigo maligna melanoma	恶性雀斑样黑色素瘤	A subtype of melanoma in situ that typically develops on sun-damaged skin. The lesion is typically a large, irregularly pigmented macule that has developed from an ordinary lentigo (a small pigmented spot on the skin with a clearly-defined edge). Change to a malignant lentigo typically takes place over 20 years or more, and many patients accept the change as a consequence of aging.	校对中...
HP:0012060	Acral lentiginous melanoma	肢端雀斑样黑色素瘤	A type of cutaneous melanoma localized to the palm, sole, or beneath the nail (subungual melanoma). Acral lentiginous melanoma starts as a slowly-enlarging flat patch of discoloured skin and usually displays a size above 6 mm and often several centimetres or more in diameter upon diagnosis and variable pigmentation with a mixutre of colors including brown, and blue-grey, black and red. The surface of the lesion is initially smooth but later in the course may become thicker and irregular, and may ulcerate or bleed.	校对中...

HP:0012520	Perivascular spaces	血管周围间隙	Increased dimensions of the Virchow-Robin spaces (also known as perivascular spaces), which surround the walls of vessels as they course from the subarachnoid space through the brain parenchyma. Perivascular spaces are commonly microscopic, and not visible on conventional neuroimaging. This term refers to an increase of size of these spaces such that they are visible on neuroimaging (usually magnetic resonance imaging). The dilatations are regular cavities that always contain a patent artery.	校对中...

HP:0012522	Spider hemangioma	蜘蛛痣	A form of telangiectasis characterized by a central elevated red dot the size of a pinhead, representing an arteriole, with numerous small blood vessels that radiate out thereby resembling the legs of a spider. Characteristically, compression of the central arteriole causes the entire lesion to blanch, and the lesion quickly refills once the compression is released.	校对中...

HP:0012535	Abnormal synaptic transmission	突触传递异常	An anomaly in the communication from a neuron to a target across a synapse. This is a four step process, comprising (i) synthesis and storage of neurotransmitters; (ii) neurotransmitter release; (iii) activation of postsynaptic receptors by the neurotransmitter; and (iv) inactivation of the neurotransmitter. Thus, this term is defined as an anomaly of neurotransmitter metabolic process.	校对中...

HP:0012798	Pulmonary lymphangiomyomatosis	肺淋巴管肌瘤病	Infiltration of smooth muscle-like cells in lymph vessels as well as the lung (pleura, alveolar septa, bronchi, pulmonary vessels and lymphatics as well as lymph nodes, especially in posterior mediastinum and retroperitoneum). Focal emphysema can develop because of airway narrowing, and the thoracic duct may be obliterated. Pulmonary lymphangiomyomatosis may lead to multiple small cysts with a hamartomatous proliferation of smooth muscle in their walls.	校对中...

HP:0012823	Clinical modifier	临床调节因素	This subontology is designed to provide terms to characterize and specify the phenotypic abnormalities defined in the Phenotypic abnormality subontology, with respect to severity, laterality, age of onset, and other aspects.	校对中...
HP:0012824	Severity	严重程度	The intensity or degree of a manifestation.	校对中...
HP:0012825	Mild	轻度	Having a relatively minor degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between two and three standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	校对中...
HP:0012826	Moderate	中度	Having a medium degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between three and four standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	校对中...
HP:0012827	Borderline	正常范围界限	Having a minor degree of severity that is considered to be on the boundary between the normal and the abnormal ranges. For quantitative traits, a deviation of that is less than two standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	校对中...
HP:0012828	Severe	重度	Having a high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between four and five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	校对中...
HP:0012829	Profound	非常严重	Having an extremely high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of more than five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	校对中...
HP:0012830	Position	位置	The anatomical localization of the specified phenotypic abnormality.	校对中...
HP:0012831	Laterality	偏侧性	The localization with respect to the side of the body of the specified phenotypic abnormality.	校对中...

HP:0012833	Unilateral	单侧	Being present on only the left or only the right side of the body.	校对中...

HP:0020102	Pneumocystis jirovecii pneumonia	肺孢子菌肺炎	An opportunistic disease caused by invasion of unicellular fungus Pneumocystis jirovecii. Transmission of P. jirovecii cysts takes place through the airborne route, and usually, its presence in lungs is asymptomatic. However, people with impaired immunity, especially those with CD4+ T cell count below 200/microliter, are still at risk of the development of Pneumocystis pneumonia due to P. jirovecii invasion. Symptoms induced by this disease are not specific: progressive dyspnoea, non-productive cough, low-grade fever, arterial partial pressure of oxygen below 65 mmHg, and chest radiographs demonstrating bilateral, interstitial shadowing.	校对中...
HP:0020103	Invasive pulmonary aspergillosis	侵袭性肺曲霉菌病	Infection of the lungs with aspergillus. In the respiratory mucosa, the spores may germinate into hyphae, which in turn can invade the mucosa leading to invasive pulmonary aspergillosis.	校对中...

HP:0020105	Severe toxoplasmosis	重度弓形虫感染	Toxoplasmosis is a widespread parasitic infection that is frequently asymptomatic in immunocompetent patients. However, this obligate intracellular protozoan parasite can evade the immune system and persist for the life of its host in cyst form, predominantly in the brain, retina, and muscles. Reactivation of latent cysts may occur when the immune system fails to maintain cytokine pressure, which mainly relies on gamma interferon (IFN-gamma). Toxoplasmosis is a life-threatening infection in immunocompromised patients (ICPs).	校对中...
HP:0020106	Severe giardiasis	重度贾第虫感染	An unusually severe infection due to Giardia lamblia, also called Giardia duodenalis or Giardia intestinalis, which is a protozoan parasite of the small intestine that causes extensive morbidity worldwide.	校对中...

HP:0020114	Persistent human papillomavirus infection	持续性人乳头瘤病毒感染	Human papillomaviruses (HPVs) are small oncogenic viruses. HPV has been shown to cause a variety of lesions and malignancies, which predominantly affect the anogenital region. Low-risk, non-oncogenic HPV types are associated with anogenital warts and recurrent respiratory papillomatosis while high-risk, oncogenic types are associated with cervical, penile, anal, vaginal, vulvar, and oropharyngeal cancers. Infection with anogenital HPV is usually asymptomatic and resolves spontaneously without consequences in the immunocompetent host. When disease does occur, the most common manifestation is genital warts, which may be small papules, or flat, smooth or pedunculated lesions. This resolution of HPV lesions is not generally seen in the immunosuppressed, resulting in severe, persistent and extensive manifestations of HPV disease.	校对中...

By specifically cleaving fibrinogen A from fibrinogen, batroxobin leads to the formation of a stable fibrin clot. The time, starting from the addition of batroxobin to the plasma sample, until clot formation is the reptilase time and is given in seconds.	校对中...

HP:0020214	Startle-induced seizure	惊吓诱发性癫痫发作	Startle-induced seizures are triggered by multiple and non-specific stimuli (auditory, somatosensory, and rarely visual) and are characterized by their sudden unexpected nature. Sudden noise rather than pure sound is the most effective acoustic stimulus.	校对中...

HP:0020219	Motor seizure	运动性癫痫发作	A motor seizure is a type of seizure that is characterized at onset by involvement of the skeletal musculature. The motor event could consist of an increase (positive) or decrease (negative) in muscle contraction to produce a movement.	校对中...
HP:0020220	Focal atonic seizure	局灶性无力型癫痫发作	A focal seizure characterized at onset by sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone without apparent preceding myoclonic or tonic activity, typically lasting more than 500 ms but less than 2 seconds. It may involve the head, trunk, jaw or limb musculature.	校对中...

HP:0025021	Abnormal erythrocyte sedimentation rate	红细胞沉降率异常	A deviation from normal range of the erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR), a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. An elevation may indicate inflammation or may be caused by any condition that elevates fibrinogen. A decreased ESR may be seen in polycythemia or in certain blood diseases in which red blood cells have an irregular or smaller shape that causes slower settling.	校对中...
HP:0025022	Decreased erythrocyte sedimentation rate	红细胞沉降率下降	A reduced erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR). HP:0025104	Capillary malformation	毛细血管畸形	A capillary malformation is a flat, sharply defined vascular stain of the skin. HP:0025105	Nevus anemicus	贫血痣	A congenital skin lesion characterized by irregular hypopigmented macules that coalesce to form plaques and occur particularly on the chest. It is generally present at birth or develops in the first days of life. It is more common in females. Diagnosis is confirmed by applying gentle friction to the lesion and the surrounding skin and checking that the erythema produced in the healthy skin does not appear in the hypopigmented lesion. This pale macule becomes more conspicuous when the lesion and its surroundings are rubbed. The margin of the naevus is ill-defined and consists of an archipelago of small anaemic spots.	校对中...
HP:0025106	Nevus roseus	玫瑰痣	A variant of port-wine stain characterized by a pale red or even pink tone, in contrast to the darker hue of the port-wine stain. By analogy with the term port-wine stain, this variant rose-wine stain, or nevus roseus. Nevus roseus, however, cannot be definitely diagnosed until adulthood as port-wine stains are sometimes pink in children. While the natural history of port-wine stains includes hypertrophy, darkening, and nodularity, nevus roseus remains unchanged for life.	校对中...
HP:0025107	Cutis marmorata telangiectatica congenita	先天性毛细血管扩张性大理石样皮肤	A congenital vascular malformation that presents as localized or generalized erythematous-telangiectatic lesions with a reticular pattern; the lesions are almost always present at birth or develop in the first days of life. Cutis marmorata telangiectatica congenita (CMTC) appears as marble-like pattern (mottling) on the surface of the skin. In contrast to cutis marmorata, the marbling is more severe and always visible.	校对中...

HP:0025114	Hypergranulosis	颗粒层增厚	Hypergranulosis is an increased thickness of the stratum granulosum.	校对中...
HP:0025115	Civatte bodies	胶样小体	Eosinophilic hyaline ovoid bodies which are often found in the subepidermal papillary regions or sometimes in the epidermis. Civatte bodies (CBs) are seen as rounded, homogenous, eosinophilic masses on routine H and E staining lying in the deeper parts of epidermis/epithelium and more frequently in dermis/connective tissue. They are known as CBs (in epithelium/epidermis), colloid bodies, or hyaline bodies (in connective tissue). They are 10-25 micrometers in diameter and situated mostly within or above the inflammatory cell infiltrate. In lichen planus, the number of necrotic keratinocytes may be so large that they are seen lying in clusters in the uppermost dermis. These bodies show a positive periodic acid Schiff reaction and are diastase resistant	校对中...
HP:0025116	Fetal distress	胎儿窘迫	An intrauterine state characterized by suboptimal values in the fetal heart rate, oxygenation of fetal blood, or other parameters indicative of compromise of the fetus. Signs of fetal distress include repetitive variable decelerations, fetal tachycardia or bradycardia, late decelerations, or low biophysical profile.	校对中...
HP:0025117	Rete ridge flattening	网脊扁平化	Rete pegs (or ridges) are the epithelial extensions that project into the underlying connective tissue in both skin and mucous membranes. Rete ridge flattening refers to the loss of these projections so that the skin epithelium acquires a relatively flat appearance.	校对中...

HP:0025124	Fragile teeth	牙齿发脆	A tendency of teeth to fracture as manifested by a history of repeated fracture of the dental enamel without adequate trauma.	校对中...
HP:0025125	White lesion of the oral mucosa	口腔黏膜白色病变	White lesions of the oral mucosa are generally caused by a condition that increases the thickness of the epithelium. This increases the distance to the vascular bed and thereby tends to change the usual reddish color of the oral mucosa to white. Common causes include hyperkeratosis (thickening of the keratin layer), acanthosis (thickening of the spinous cell layer), increased edema in the epithelium (leukoedema), and reduced vascularity of the underlying lamina propria. Additionally, fibrin caps or surface ulcerations and collapsed bullae can appear white.	校对中...
HP:0025126	Oral hairy leukoplakia	口腔毛状白斑	A corrugated white lesion of the oral mucosa that usually occurs on the lateral or ventral surfaces of the tongue and may have a shaggy or frayed appearance.	校对中...
HP:0025127	Actinic keratosis	光化性角化病	A scaly, crusty lesion caused by damage from the ultraviolet radiation of the sun, with typical location on sun-exposed areas of the skin. Actinic keratosis lesions are often elevated, rough, and wartlike, and may be red, or occasionally tan, pink, or flesh-toned in color.	校对中...
HP:0025128	Reduced intraabdominal adipose tissue	腹腔内脂肪组织减少	An abnormally reduced amount of adipose tissue in the abdominal cavity.	校对中...
HP:0025129	Abnormal small intestinal mucosa morphology	小肠粘膜形态异常	A structural anomaly of the mucous lining of the small intestine.	校对中...
HP:0025130	Decreased small intestinal mucosa lactase level	小肠黏膜乳糖酶水平降低	Lactase is produced in the small intestine in humans, Lactase is a member of the beta-galactosidase family of enzymes, and hydrolyzes D-lactose to form D-galactose and D-glucose, which can be absorbed by the small intestine. There are many ways of assessing lactase activity. In one test, an endoscopic biopsy from the postbulbar duodenum is incubated with lactose on a test plate, and a color reaction develops within 20 min as a result of hydrolyzed lactose (a positive result) in patients with normolactasia, whereas no reaction (a negative result) develops in patients with severe hypolactasia. Other, less direct, tests include the hydrogen breath test, and blood tests following lactose challenges.	校对中...

HP:0025160	Abnormal temper tantrums	异常发脾气	A temper tantrum is an emotional outburst usually triggered by a sense of frustration and manifested as whining and crying, screaming, kicking, hitting, and breath holding. Temper tantrums are normal in toddlers and young children and usually happen between the ages of one to three years. Temper tantrums may be considered abnormal if they occur at an unusually high frequency, are of unusual severity, or occur at an old age than usual.	校对中...

HP:0025172	Smooth septal thickening on pulmonary HRCT	HRCT可见肺部间隔光滑性增厚	Thickening of the interlobular septa of the lungs as seen on a high-resolution computed tomography scan with a smooth appearance of the interlobular septa.	校对中...

HP:0025175	Honeycomb lung	蜂窝状肺	Honeycombing represents destroyed and fibrotic lung tissue containing numerous cystic airspaces with thick fibrous walls, representing the late stage of various lung diseases, with complete loss of acinar architecture. The cysts range in size from a few millimeters to several centimeters in diameter, have variable wall thickness, and are lined by metaplastic bronchiolar epithelium. On chest radiographs, honeycombing appears as closely approximated ring shadows, typically 3-10 mm in diameter with walls 1-3 mm in thickness, that resemble a honeycomb; the finding implies end-stage lung disease. On CT scans, the appearance is of clustered cystic air spaces, typically of comparable diameters on the order of 3-10 mm but occasionally as large as 2.5 cm. Honeycombing is usually subpleural and is characterized by well-defined walls. It is a CT feature of established pulmonary fibrosis. Because honeycombing is often considered specific for pulmonary fibrosis and is an important criterion in the diagnosis of usual interstitial pneumonia, the term should be used with care, as it may directly impact patient care.	校对中...
HP:0025176	Intralobular interstitial thickening	小叶间质增厚	A fine reticular pattern on high-resolution computed tomography, with the visible lines separated by a few millimeters. Regions of the lung with intralobular interstitial thickening characteristically show a fine lacelike or netlike appearance.	校对中...
HP:0025177	Peribronchovascular interstitial thickening	支气管周围血管间质增厚	Thickening of the peribronchovascular interstitium, a connective tissue sheath that surrounds the central bronchi and pulmonary arteries. The peribronchovascular interstitium extends from the level of the pulmonary hila into the peripheral lung. This feature may be ascertained on high-resolution computer tomography.	校对中...
HP:0025178	Subpleural interstitial thickening	胸膜下间质增厚	Increase in thickness of the subpleural interstitium.	校对中...
HP:0025179	Ground-glass opacification	毛玻璃样结构	On chest radiographs, ground-glass opacity appears as an area of hazy increased lung opacity, usually extensive, within whichmargins of pulmonary vessels may be indistinct. On CT scans, it appears as hazy increased opacity of lung, with preservation of bronchial and vascular margins. It is caused by partial filling of airspaces, interstitial thickening (due to fluid, cells, and/or fibrosis), partial collapse of alveoli, increased capillary blood volume, or a combination of these, the common factor being the partial displacement of air. Ground-glass opacity is less opaque than consolidation, in which bronchovascular margins are obscured.	校对中...

In Marcus Gunn jaw winking synkinesis, elevation and even retraction of the affected eyelid is triggered by chewing, suction, lateral mandible movement, smiling, sternocleidomastoid contraction, protruding tongue, Valsalva manoeuvre and even by breathing.	校对中...

HP:0025196	Increased total iron binding capacity	总铁结合力增高	An elevation in the total-iron binding capacity, which measures how much serum iron is bound if an excess of radioactive iron is added. HP:0025197	Inclusion body fibromatosis	包涵体纤维瘤病	A benign tumor made up of mostly myofibroblasts that appears almost exclusively on the digits of the hands and feet, rarely involving the thumb or big toe. The lesion displays a proliferation of bland intradermal spindle cells arranged in whorls, fascicles, or a storiform pattern in a collagenous background of varying degrees. Also usually present are perpendicular tumor cell fascicles that extend to the epidermis. The small intracytoplasmic inclusions are said to appear similar to red blood cells. The inclusion bodies have been shown to be made up of densely packed vimentin and actin filaments. The tumor often causes a dome-shaped elevation of the overlying structures, forming a protuberant or polypoid nodule. The overlying epidermis can display a host of changes, including acanthosis, hyperkeratosis, parakeratosis, rete ridge flattening, entrapment of adnexal structures, and, rarely, ulceration.	校对中...
